sentences.en: A six - pointed star formed by extending each of the sides of regular hexagon into equilateral triangles.
sentences.cn: 来自于正六角形的两个完全等边三角形组成的正多边形.

sentences.en: An equilateral triangle cannot be dissected into finitely many incongruent equilateral triangles.
sentences.cn: 等边三角形不能分成有限多个不全等的等边三角形.

sentences.en: An equilateral triangle has all sides equal and all angles equal.
sentences.cn: 等腰三角形有两条边相等,且有两个相等角.

sentences.en: Bridge of the nose high and straight, from Biduan to Erjian and for the equilateral triangle.
sentences.cn: 鼻梁高而直, 从鼻端到耳尖恰为等边三角形.

sentences.en: Conclusions In general, endometrial cavity is mostly isosceles triangle or equilateral triangle.
sentences.cn: 结论普通人群宫腔形态以形态规则的等腰三角宫腔和等边三角宫腔为主.

sentences.en: It passes through the N atom and through the center of the equilateral triangle.
sentences.cn: 它通过N原子及三个H原子组成的等边三角形的中心.

sentences.en: Our Middle Class consists of Equilateral or Equal - Sided Triangles.
sentences.cn: 我们的中产阶级由等边三角形、也称各边相等的三角形组成.

sentences.en: The angles are equal, for ABC is equilateral.
sentences.cn: 三角相等, 因为三角形ABC是等边三角形.

sentences.en: The demand curve is thus an equilateral hyperbola.
sentences.cn: 因此需求曲线是等轴双曲线.

sentences.en: Three - sided equilateral triangle that can be customized by dragging any selection handle.
sentences.cn: 可通过拖动任一选择手柄来自定义的等边三角形.

trans.tran_en: A shape or figure that is equilateral has sides that are all the same length
